verbs.description: halloween 5k monster mile [V: takes] off [ARGM-ADV: oct 27] [ARG1: fleet feet] is hosting the annual halloween 5k monster mile formerly known as spooktacular in downtown huntsville the 5k begins at 8 a m at 200 church street followed by the monster mile at 9 a m runners are encouraged to wear their best costume 5k
